Literature.Title: Wasp venom peptide, synoeca-MP, from Synoeca surinama shows antimicrobial activity against human and animal pathogenic microorganisms
Literature.Author: Freire DO, da Cunha NB, Leite ML, Kostopoulos AGC, da Silva SNB, de Souza AC, Nolasco DO, Franco OL, Mortari MR, Dias SC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC50=2.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC90=2.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC50=1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC90=1.9µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC50=2.2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC90=2.3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC50=2.2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC90=2.3µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC50=10.7µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC90=17.8µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC50=8.3µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC90=17.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC50=4.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC90=5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 496193(MIC50=5.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 496193(MIC90=5.9µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC50=5.3µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC90=6.3µM),Candida albicans(MIC=40µM),Candida krusei(MIC=20µM),Candida guilliermondii(MIC=20µM),Candida glabrata(MIC=20µM),Debaryomyces hansenii(MIC=40µM),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=20µM)
